comment:
* Listener for changes to the state of accessibility services. * *

* This refers to changes to {@link AccessibilityServiceInfo}, including: *

    *
  • Whenever a service is enabled or disabled, or its info has been set or removed.
    • *
  • Whenever a metadata attribute of any running service's info changes.
    • *
* * @see #getEnabledAccessibilityServiceList for a list of infos of the enabled accessibility * services. * @see #addAccessibilityServicesStateChangeListener *

methods.name: void onAccessibilityServicesStateChanged(@NonNull AccessibilityManager manager)
methods.comment:
* Called when the state of accessibility services changes.
         *
         * @param manager The manager that is calling back
